trans-unit.source: The key is the template type, the value is a path or the alias. Supported types are:
trans-unit.target: 键是模板类型,值是路径或别名。支持的类型有:

trans-unit.source: The key may be specified in a dot format to retrieve the value of a sub-array or the property of an embedded object. In particular, if the key is x.y.z, then the returned value would be $array['x']['y']['z'] or $array->x->y->z (if $array is an object). If $array['x'] or $array->x is neither an array nor an object, the default value will be returned. Note that if the array already has an element x.y.z, then its value will be returned instead of going through the sub-arrays. So it is better to be done specifying an array of key names like ['x', 'y', 'z'].
trans-unit.target: 可以以点格式指定键，以检索子数组的值或嵌入式对象的属性。特别是，如果键是 x.y.z ，则返回的值将是 $array['x']['y']['z'] 或 $array->x->y->z （如果 $array 是一个目的）。如果 $array['x'] 或 $array->x 既不是数组也不是对象，则将返回默认值。请注意，如果数组已经具有元素 x.y.z ，则将返回其值，而不是通过子数组。因此，最好指定一个键名数组，例如 ['x', 'y', 'z'] 。

trans-unit.target: 要删除的值的键

trans-unit.target: 识别CSS代码块的键。如果为空,将使用$css作为key。如果两个CSS代码块用同一个key注册,后者将覆盖前者。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the CSS script file. If null, it will use $url as the key. If two CSS files are registered with the same key, the latter will overwrite the former.
trans-unit.target: 识别CSS脚本文件的键。如果为空,将使用$url作为key。如果两个CSS文件用同一个key注册,后者将覆盖前者。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the JS code block. If null, it will use $js as the key. If two JS code blocks are registered with the same key, the latter will overwrite the former.
trans-unit.target: 识别JS代码块的键。如果为空,它将使用$js作为键。如果两个JS代码块用同一个键注册,后者将覆盖前者。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the JS script file. If null, it will use $url as the key. If two JS files are registered with the same key at the same position, the latter will overwrite the former. Note that position option takes precedence, thus files registered with the same key, but different position option will not override each other.
trans-unit.target: 识别JS脚本文件的键。如果为空,它将使用$url作为键。如果两个JS文件在同一位置用同一个key注册,后者将覆盖前者。注意,位置选项优先,因此用相同的键注册的文件,但不同的位置选项不会覆盖对方。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the link tag. If two link tags are registered with the same key, the latter will overwrite the former. If this is null, the new link tag will be appended to the existing ones.
trans-unit.target: 识别链接标签的键。如果两个链接标签用同一个键注册,后者将覆盖前者。如果这个键为空,新的链接标签将被附加到现有的链接标签上。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the meta tag. If two meta tags are registered with the same key, the latter will overwrite the former. If this is null, the new meta tag will be appended to the existing ones.

trans-unit.source: The key(s) to be sorted by. This refers to a key name of the sub-array elements, a property name of the objects, or an anonymous function returning the values for comparison purpose. The anonymous function signature should be: function($item). To sort by multiple keys, provide an array of keys here.

trans-unit.source: The keys of assetMap are the asset names that you want to fix, and the values are the desired asset paths. When you register an asset bundle with a view, each relative asset file in its css and js arrays will be examined against this map. If any of the keys are found to be the last part of an asset file (which is prefixed with yii\web\AssetBundle::$sourcePath if available), the corresponding value will replace the asset and be registered with the view. For example, the asset file my/path/to/jquery.js matches the key jquery.js.
trans-unit.target: assetMap的键是要修复的资产名称，值是所需的资产路径。当您在视图中注册资产束时，将对照此映射检查其css和js数组中的每个相关资产文件。如果发现任何键是资产文件的最后一部分（前缀为yii \ web \ AssetBundle :: $ sourcePath（如果可用）），则对应的值将替换资产并在视图中注册。例如，资产文件 my/path/to/jquery.js 与键 jquery.js 匹配。

trans-unit.source: The keys of the formats property are the supported MIME types, while the values are the corresponding response format names which must be supported in yii\web\Response::$formatters.
trans-unit.target: formats 属性的键是受支持的MIME类型，而值是yii \ web \ Response :: $ formatters中必须支持的相应响应格式名称。

trans-unit.source: The log file is specified via $logFile. If the size of the log file exceeds $maxFileSize (in kilo-bytes), a rotation will be performed, which renames the current log file by suffixing the file name with '.1'. All existing log files are moved backwards by one place, i.e., '.2' to '.3', '.1' to '.2', and so on. The property $maxLogFiles specifies how many history files to keep.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件通过$ logFile指定。如果日志文件的大小超过$ maxFileSize（以千字节为单位），将执行轮换，通过在文件名后缀'.1'重命名当前日志文件。所有现有的日志文件都向后移动一个位置，即“ .2”到“ .3”，“。1”到“ .2”，依此类推。属性$ maxLogFiles指定要保留的历史记录文件数。

trans-unit.source: The method yii\db\Query::batch() and yii\db\Query::each() return an yii\db\BatchQueryResult object which implements the Iterator interface and thus can be used in the foreach construct. During the first iteration, a SQL query is made to the database. Data is then fetched in batches in the remaining iterations. By default, the batch size is 100, meaning 100 rows of data are being fetched in each batch. You can change the batch size by passing the first parameter to the batch() or each() method.
trans-unit.target: 方法yii \ db \ Query :: batch（）和yii \ db \ Query :: each（）返回yii \ db \ BatchQueryResult对象，该对象实现了 Iterator 接口，因此可以在 foreach 构造中使用。在第一次迭代期间，将对数据库进行SQL查询。然后在剩余的迭代中分批提取数据。默认情况下，批大小为100，这意味着每批中将提取100行数据。您可以通过将第一个参数传递给 batch() 或 each() 方法来更改批量大小。

trans-unit.source: The method first checks if the action ID has been declared in actions(). If so, it will use the configuration declared there to create the action object. If not, it will look for a controller method whose name is in the format of actionXyz where Xyz stands for the action ID. If found, an yii\base\InlineAction representing that method will be created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先检查是否在action（）中声明了动作ID 。如果是这样，它将使用在那里声明的配置来创建操作对象。如果不是，它会寻找一个控制器的方法，其名称是在格式 actionXyz 其中 Xyz 代表动作ID。如果找到，则代表该方法的yii \ base \ InlineAction将被创建并返回。

You may configure these components, or even replace them with your own implementations, easily through functionality provided by the service locator.

trans-unit.source: The name of the relation that is the inverse of this relation. For example, an order has a customer, which means the inverse of the "customer" relation is the "orders", and the inverse of the "orders" relation is the "customer". If this property is set, the primary record(s) will be referenced through the specified relation. For example, $customer->orders[0]->customer and $customer will be the same object, and accessing the customer of an order will not trigger new DB query. This property is only used in relational context.
trans-unit.target: 与该关系相反的关系的名称。例如，一个订单有一个客户，这意味着“客户”关系的逆是“订单”，而“订单”关系的逆是“客户”。如果设置了此属性，则将通过指定的关系引用主记录。例如， $customer->orders[0]->customer 和 $customer 将是同一对象，访问订单的客户将不会触发新的数据库查询。此属性仅在关系上下文中使用。

trans-unit.source: The new column type. The getColumnType() method will be invoked to convert abstract column type (if any) into the physical one. Anything that is not recognized as abstract type will be kept in the generated SQL. For example, 'string' will be turned into 'varchar(255)', while 'string not null' will become 'varchar(255) not null'.
trans-unit.target: 新的列类型。的getColumnType（）方法将被调用转换抽象列类型（如果有的话）到物理之一。任何未被识别为抽象类型的内容都将保留在生成的SQL中。例如，“字符串”将变成“ varchar（255）”，而“字符串不为空”将变成“ varchar（255）不为空”。

trans-unit.source: The new column type. The getColumnType() method will be invoked to convert abstract column type (if any) into the physical one. Anything that is not recognized as abstract type will be kept in the generated SQL. For example, 'string' will be turned into 'varchar(255)', while 'string not null' will become 'varchar(255) not null'. You can also use PostgreSQL-specific syntax such as SET NOT NULL.
trans-unit.target: 新的列类型。的getColumnType（）方法将被调用转换抽象列类型（如果有的话）到物理之一。任何未被识别为抽象类型的内容都将保留在生成的SQL中。例如，“字符串”将变成“ varchar（255）”，而“字符串不为空”将变成“ varchar（255）不为空”。您还可以使用特定于PostgreSQL的语法，例如 SET NOT NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The new column type. The yii\db\QueryBuilder::getColumnType() method will be invoked to convert abstract column type (if any) into the physical one. Anything that is not recognized as abstract type will be kept in the generated SQL. For example, 'string' will be turned into 'varchar(255)', while 'string not null' will become 'varchar(255) not null'.
trans-unit.target: 新的列类型。所述YII \分贝\ QueryBuilder的:: getColumnType（）方法将被调用转换抽象列类型（如果有的话）到物理之一。任何未被识别为抽象类型的内容都将保留在生成的SQL中。例如，“字符串”将变成“ varchar（255）”，而“字符串不为空”将变成“ varchar（255）不为空”。

trans-unit.source: The normalized datetime value. Since version 2.0.1 this may also return an array if $checkDateTimeInfo is true. Since version 2.0.12 the array has third boolean element indicating whether the timestamp has date information or it is just a time value.

trans-unit.source: The number of digits after the decimal point. If not given, the number of digits depends in the input value and is determined based on NumberFormatter::MIN_FRACTION_DIGITS and NumberFormatter::MAX_FRACTION_DIGITS, which can be configured using $numberFormatterOptions. If the PHP intl extension is not available, the default value depends on your PHP configuration. If you want consistent behavior between environments where intl is available and not, you should explicitly specify a value here.

trans-unit.source: The path on the server in which the cookie will be available on. The default is '/'.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上cookie可用的路径。默认值是'/'。

trans-unit.source: The path or alias of the configuration file. You may use the "yii message/config" command to generate this file and then customize it for your needs.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的路径或别名。你可以使用 "yii message/config "命令来生成这个文件,然后根据你的需要进行定制。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file with messages. Used to log an error message in case when no translations were found.
trans-unit.target: 包含信息的文件路径。用于在没有找到翻译的情况下记录错误信息。

trans-unit.source: The path/URL represented by a derived alias is determined by replacing the root alias part with its corresponding path/URL in the derived alias.
trans-unit.target: 派生别名所代表的路径/URL是通过将根别名部分替换为派生别名中对应的路径/URL来确定的。

trans-unit.source: The pattern app* indicates that all message categories whose names start with app should be translated using this message source.
trans-unit.target: 模式 app* 表示应使用此消息源来翻译名称以 app 开头的所有消息类别。

trans-unit.source: The permission corresponding to the specified name. Null is returned if no such permission.
trans-unit.target: 对应于指定名称的权限。如果没有这个权限,则返回空值。

trans-unit.target: 权限名称

trans-unit.source: The permission name.
trans-unit.target: 权限名称。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created cache files.
trans-unit.target: 对新创建的缓存文件进行权限设置。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created cache files. This value will be used by PHP chmod() function. No umask will be applied. If not set, the permission will be determined by the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的缓存文件设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。如果没有设置,权限将由当前环境决定。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created debugger data files.
trans-unit.target: 对新建的调试器数据文件进行权限设置。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created debugger data files. This value will be used by PHP \yii\debug\chmod() function. No umask will be applied. If not set, the permission will be determined by the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的调试器数据文件设置的权限。这个值将被PHP yii/debug/chmod()函数使用。不会应用掩码。如果没有设置,权限将由当前环境决定。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created directories.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的目录设置的权限。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created directories. This value will be used by PHP \yii\debug\chmod() function. No umask will be applied. Defaults to 0775, meaning the directory is read-writable by owner and group, but read-only for other users.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的目录设置的权限。这个值将被PHP \yii/debug/chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。默认值为0775,意思是目录的所有者和组可以读写,但其他用户只能读。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created directories. This value will be used by PHP chmod() function. No umask will be applied. Defaults to 0775, meaning the directory is read-writable by owner and group, but read-only for other users.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的目录设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。默认值为0775,意思是目录的所有者和组可以读写,但其他用户只能读。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created log files.
trans-unit.target: 要为新创建的日志文件设置的权限。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created log files. This value will be used by PHP chmod() function. No umask will be applied. If not set, the permission will be determined by the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的日志文件设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。如果没有设置,权限将由当前环境决定。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created mutex files.
trans-unit.target: 要为新创建的mutex文件设置的权限。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly created mutex files. This value will be used by PHP chmod() function. No umask will be applied. If not set, the permission will be determined by the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的mutex文件设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。如果没有设置,权限将由当前环境决定。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly generated asset directories.
trans-unit.target: 对新生成的资产目录进行权限设置。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly generated asset directories. This value will be used by PHP chmod() function. No umask will be applied. Defaults to 0775, meaning the directory is read-writable by owner and group, but read-only for other users.
trans-unit.target: 为新生成的资产目录设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。默认值为0775,意味着目录的所有者和组可以读写,但其他用户只能读。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly generated code files.
trans-unit.target: 对新生成的代码文件进行权限设置。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly generated code files. This value will be used by PHP chmod function. Defaults to 0666, meaning the file is read-writable by all users.
trans-unit.target: 为新生成的代码文件设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod函数使用。默认值为0666,表示该文件可以被所有用户读写。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly generated directories.
trans-unit.target: 对新生成的目录进行权限设置。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly generated directories. This value will be used by PHP chmod function. Defaults to 0777, meaning the directory can be read, written and executed by all users.
trans-unit.target: 为新生成的目录设置的权限。这个值将被PHP的chmod函数使用,默认值为0777,表示目录可以被所有用户读取、写入和执行。默认值为0777,意味着该目录可以被所有用户读取、写入和执行。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly published asset files.
trans-unit.target: 对新发布的资产文件进行权限设置。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for newly published asset files. This value will be used by PHP chmod() function. No umask will be applied. If not set, the permission will be determined by the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 为新发布的asset文件设置的权限。这个值将被PHP chmod()函数使用。不使用掩码。如果没有设置,权限将由当前环境决定。

trans-unit.source: The permission to be set for the created directory.
trans-unit.target: 要为创建的目录设置的权限。
